lead.p: Number â€“ Creates a wrapper object to allow you to work with numerical values.

example.heading: number example
example.p: Three ways of creating a new number.
example.code: var num = new Number(1000); // Creates a new number object. console.log(num); // The Number object.
var num = 1000; // Create a new number primitive. console.log(num); // The number 1000.
